program: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering (SM)

sections.text: MIT MechE’s SM program provides advanced study and research training in mechanical engineering, culminating in a thesis that addresses real engineering problems.
Students take graduate‑level subjects, complete approved math coursework, and conduct research culminating in a written thesis.

items: Thesis proposal and approved SM thesis
sections.text: The SM requires a formal thesis under faculty supervision and adherence to departmental academic policies.
Graduates advance to R&D, product design, and doctoral study in mechanical and allied fields.
